topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0 Beta: Deploying the Kenobi Patches

body.section:
Use the following steps to deploy required patches.
In the lifecycle manager, copy the kenobi-config-patch.patch you downloaded in the Prerequisites to the /root/kenobi-configuration-processor directory.
Copy the kenobi-node-config.patch you downloaded in the Prerequisites to the /root/kenobi-node-configuration directory.
Navigate to the /root/kenobi-configuration-processor directory.
Execute the following command to deploy the patch: patch -p1 < kenobi-config-patch.patch
Navigate to the /root/kenobi-node-configuration directory.
Execute the following command to deploy the patch: kenobi-node-config.patch
Execute the following command to integrate the patch into the installation environment:cd ~/cg-hlm/hlm-build ./hlm_prepare-env.sh
Enter Exit to close the lifecycle manager console.

p.i: Return to installing the non-KVM region for the tahoe memphis or sacramento template.
